revised_title: Chemical Analysis of Zoophytes and Their Component Parts
tldr: The author examines the chemical composition of various zoophytes, including Madrepora, Millepora, Tubipora, and Flustra, and finds that they are similar in composition to shells, consisting of carbonate of lime and a gelatinous or membranaceous substance. The author also discovers slight traces of phosphate of lime in Millepora polymorpha.
